#summary Making and using JamendoRadio skins.

= Introduction =

Skins are created as subfolders of the folder styles.
In the folder, you need a skin.css file as well as a lot of small image files.

The default skin has the following files in its subdirectory:
{{{
skin.css
background.png
next-active.png
next.png
pause-active.png
pause-hover.png
pause.png
play-active.png
play-hover.png
play.png
stop-active.png
stop.png
volume-active.png
volume.png
}}}

Note: Currently you need javascript dev skills to add/change the included skills.
